document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Pit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">over </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">beside, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">abroad; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Pit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">over </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">stir </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">slip </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">look </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">drop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">dream </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">sap </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Prop </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">holds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">chances </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">up. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ah! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Pit! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">over </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">depth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">thought </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">dare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ask </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">start </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">sit </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">straight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">scarce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">suspect </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Pit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">fathoms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">under </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Circuit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">same </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Doom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whom </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">start </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">tremble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">got </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Bomb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">held </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Bosom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Nay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Hold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">calm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A pit but heaven over it
